contexts.context: ...and we found, for example, 72 girls <mark>under</mark> 30, of which most have surely been baptised on...
...From Mainz, went to Worms and studied there <mark>under</mark> the great goan rabbi Isaac ben Eliezer Halevi and...
...rabbi Eleazar ben Jehudah. After that he studied <mark>under</mark> rabbi Eliakim ben Meshullam in Speyer and from there...
